user.name: Duong Dang Hung
user.bio: Master 2 student in Information Security and Cryptology | Passionate about Cybersecurity/Pentest/SOC/SIEM/CERT and AI/ML/DL | Searching for internships

node.name: SECUTIC
node.description: Program a simulation of a Certification Authority and deploy to a Web application that can fetch users' data, return a certificate and verify a certificate.

node.name: INFRARES
node.description: Implement VLAN trunking with IPSec-secured L2TPv3 tunnel in a virtual network that was manually configured and routed beforehand. Take into account security measures to simulate a secure transmission through the internet, then capturing and analyzing the network traffic.

node.name: auditres
node.description: Program an IPv4 - IPv6 translator for TCP. This translator-in-the-middle should be capable of sniffing, analyzing, auditing, and intercepting network packets so that packets can be transparently transmitted between an IPv6-based virtual machine and an IPv4-based server.

node.name: jee-rest-api
node.description: Build a full-stack distributed Teaching Services Management Web Application with microservices, following the MVC framework, using ReactJS for frontend, Java, Jakarta EE, and JDBC for backend and API, Apache Derby for database.

node.name: PPRESPROJECT
node.description: Manually use socket programming to build a Proxy server that is capable of filtering, censoring content, caching data, and monitoring incoming and outgoing network traffic between the local machine and the outer network to ensure security.

node.name: bio-ai-project
node.description: This is a project applied Neuro-evolution to create AI agents that automatically play simple computer games such as Snake-Xenzia. Here we build a whole neural network from scratch and apply Neuro-evolution to it, as well as using NEAT-python to compare their performance.
